DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the risk of systemic malignancies in pediatric patients with atopic dermatitis exposed to Elidel 1% cream.
DOC.brief_title: 10 Year Registry of Children (Ages 2-17 Years) With Eczema That Have Used Pimecrolimus
DOC.criteria: males and females greater than or equal to 2 years and less than or equal to 17 years at enrollment diagnosis of atopic dermatitis (confirmed by treating physician) applied pimecrolimus cream 1 % 6 weeks out of past 24 weeks past or present history of systemic malignancy, skin malignancy, or lymphoproliferative disease past or present use of oral immunosuppressive therapy
DOC.keyword: Atopic dermatitis, eczema, children, pediatric patients, pimecrolimus, malignancy, registry
